entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with rain beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the morning. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023
